name: Spec Ops Tools Heavy Duty Staple Gun, 1/4" - 9/16" Staples, 18-Gauge Brads, Reduced Effort
short_description: Up to 50% easier, patented torsion spring control
Military grade composite housing for up to 25% less weight
Patented flip-out wire guide for precision stapling over cables
All-metal, reversible belt hook for left and right-hand access

product_description: The 2-in-1 Heavy-Duty Staple Gun / Brad Nailer features Spec Ops patented Torsion Spring Technology for up to 50% easier squeezing that reduces hand fatigue and increases accuracy. Up to 25% lighter design with a military grade composite housing, this staple gun is light on the belt yet delivers extreme staple driving power. With a patented, flip-out wire guide, this hand stapler allows for precision stapling over cables and includes a low fastener indicator for added convenience. The all-metal, reversible belt hook is designed for left and right-hand access. Perfect for insulation, house-wrap, fabric, upholstery, wood or furniture repair. The bottom load design allows for rapid re-loading and fail-safe jam clearing. All Spec Ops tools are backed by our five-star, hassle-free lifetime warranty, and with each purchase made, we support our nation’s heroes by donating 3% of proceeds to veteran and first responder causes.

product_description: The Milwaukee M12 3/8” Crown Stapler delivers a true hand tool replacement. It is designed to drive a range of 3/8” flat crown staples (1/4”-9/16”) through an array of materials and substrates. short_description: 1.[Versatile Staple Gun]-This 2 in 1 staple gun with 1000 T50 staples of 3/8 inch is suitable for upholstery, home repairs, wood crafts, decoration, furniture, DIY projects and more different renovation needs. The excellent feature of this upholstery staple gun being portable makes it the perfect choice for any builder, maker, or craftsman.

2.[Various Staples Compatibility]-This YEAHOME 2 in 1 stapler gun is expertly crafted for use with heavy duty staples, ideal for a wide variety of applications. This staple gun for wood is not only compatible with T50 staples within the range of 1/4" - 9/16", but also with 18GA brad nails of 3/8", 1/2" and 9/16", making it effortlessly handle various tasks around the home, workshop, or office. Please selecting the correct staple size when use.

3.[Ergonomic Handle Design]-Featuring a forward action design handle, this upholstery staple gun allows the user to push against the handle rather than squeeze, eliminates staple gun"kickback" and simultaneously reduces hand fatigue. This ergonomic user-friendly design enables users suffering from arthritis, those with small hands, or those with insufficient strength to perform easy, stable and precise operations with ease.

4.[User-Friendly Operation]-This wood staple gun for crafts is easy to operate and very user-friendly. Without complicated and annoying reloading, just a simple operation can quickly release the latch, allowing you to replace the staple strips in just a few seconds. The staple reload window can clearly show your staple supply, reminding you when it's time to reload.

5.[Easy Use and Portable]-The rugged plastic body provides strength and durability. Meanwhile its portable design brings unparalleled convenience. This upholstery staple gun is fit for most tool kits or tool belts. Due to its lightweight feature, this staple gun ensures efficiency and accessibility whenever you are working. This staple gun for wood is an essential addition to the toolkit of any DIY lover or professional.
